title: Migrate E2E tests from Playwright to agent-browser
description:
Replace Playwright E2E tests with agent-browser skill for Nuxt 4.

Steps:
1. Document existing test flows from tests/e2e/*.spec.ts
2. Create equivalent test runs using agent-browser skill
3. Verify all user flows work with agent-browser:
   - Authentication (sign in, sign up, logout)
   - Team management
   - Profile management
   - Password reset
   - Navigation
4. Remove legacy Playwright tests after migration

Agent-browser advantages over Playwright:
- AI-powered element selection (no brittle selectors)
- Natural language test descriptions
- Automatic adaptation to UI changes
- Built into Claude Code workflow

Test: All flows verified using /agent-browser skill
acceptance_criteria: All E2E flows verified with agent-browser, Playwright removed
